thread.title: McDonald's Invented a Straw That Will Make Your Shamrock Shake Taste Even Better
thread.title_full: McDonald's Invented a Straw That Will Make Your Shamrock Shake Taste Even Better

author: Cosmopolitan.com
title: McDonald's Invented a Straw That Will Make Your Shamrock Shake Taste Even Better
text:
When you take a sip of a Shamrock Shake (or any shake with multiple layers), you can get too much of one flavor per sip. That lack of a perfect flavor-to-flavor ratio can leave you seriously distraught. To put an end to that feeling, McDonald's has come up with a solution: The STRAW.
Last week the chain announced four takes on the Shamrock Shake , including the Chocolate Shamrock Shake, which inspired the STRAW. This Chocolate Shamrock Shake has a layer of chocolate underneath the classic Shamrock Shake (vanilla ice cream with a mint Shamrock Shake syrup).
